description: A cruise ship can take at most 1500 people . A profit of $ 500 is made on each long - term cruise ticket and a profit of $ 150 is made on each week - long cruise ticket . There are a minimum of 35 long - term cruise tickets available . However , at least 4 times as many people prefer to buy week - long cruise tickets than long - term cruise tickets . How many of each ticket should be sold to maximize profit ?
